text: How to discard from the middle of a list using list comprehensions?
I could do this using an index but I thought there must be a cleaner way using list comprehensions.
I hope it's not embarrassingly obvious.

code:
for x in firstList:
    firstFunc(x)
    secondFunc(x)
    x = process(x)
    if x.discard == True:
        (get rid of x)
secondList.append(firstList)
